title: Looking for silver - gold player to duo
body: I'm a Jg main I need a good adc top or mid if your guys can add me  ign: UNKNOW11111

replies.body: Hi there, this is JLYFireGod. I am the leader of our group. I was gold and almost platinum in s6. We usually start our game at midnight. The reason is I am trying to boost our teammates skills, in midnight, it has higher percentage to meet older players. Although one of our member is new here. I still boost his level up. We are a nice team. We don't care lose, we care is what we learn and what we try the best in game.
